```{r}

d.wide <- sapply(c(50,100,500),rnorm, 0,1)

d.long <- rbind.data.frame(
  cbind.data.frame(samplesize = "n=50",  values = d.wide[[1]]),
  cbind.data.frame(samplesize = "n=100",  values = d.wide[[2]]),
  cbind.data.frame(samplesize = "n=500", values = d.wide[[3]])
)

require(ggplot2)
ggplot(d.long, aes(x=values)) + geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..)) + facet_grid(.~samplesize)
```
